  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120541</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120541</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Simetrija in uporaba Gaussovega zakona</string>
            <string language="en">Symmetry and Using Gauss's Law</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Symmetrie und Verwenden des Gesetzes des Gausss</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Symétrie et utilisation de la loi du gauss</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Simetria e usar a lei do gauss</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simmetria ed usando legge del gauss</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμμετρία και χρησιμοποίηση του νόμου του Gaoy'</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Simetría y usar la ley del gauss</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Različne simetrične ploskve in njihove normale pri točkastem naboju in pri naelektreni plošči.</string>
            <string language="en">Different symmetric surfaces and their normals in case of a charged particle and in case of a charged surface.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gaussova ploskva</string>
            <string language="en">gaussian surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno polje</string>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gaussov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">gauss's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschiedliche symmetrische Oberflächen und 
ihre normals falls von einem belasteten Partikel und falls von einer 
belasteten Oberfläche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Différentes surfaces symétriques et leurs 
normals en cas de particule chargée et en cas de surface chargée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Superfícies symmetric diferentes e seus normals 
caso que de uma partícula carregada e caso que de uma superfície 
carregada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Superfici simmetriche differenti ed i loro 
normals nel caso di una particella caricata e nel caso di una 
superficie caricata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορετικές συμμετρικές επιφάνειες και τα normals 
τους σε περίπτωση χρεωμένου μορίου και σε περίπτωση χρεωμένης 
επιφάνειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diversas superficies simétricas y sus normals en
caso de que de una partícula cargada y en caso de que de una 
superficie cargada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gaußsche Oberfläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Gausss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">surface gaussienne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi du gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">superfície gaussian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">superficie gaussiana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge del gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γκαουσσιανή επιφάνεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος Gaoy'</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">superficie gaussian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del gauss</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
